Invocation Name: radio r. v.
des:
Nothing But The Truth Radio Station is an extension of Nothing But The Truth Church
with the goal of reaching the lost world with the message of Christ Crucified and Him alone on the Cross 1 Corinthians 1:23 This Radio knows only one True Message: which is the message of the Cross Anointed and Prophetic and no sugar coated that will draw ALL men unto God to bow down on their knees to worship Him in Spirit and Truth! Amen."The skill content is in English, French and Haitian creole language."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
